snippet.title: Grill on Wheels
snippet.description:
Hey, Grill on Wheels community!

We're thrilled to introduce you to our upcoming game, 🚚 Grill on Wheels 🚚 - a sizzling new VR cooking/resource management adventure that will leave you craving for more!

And the best part? We're opening a closed beta, and you're invited to be among the first to savor this culinary delight!

🍔 What's Grill on Wheels?

Grill on Wheels is an immersive VR cooking experience that takes you on a culinary road trip like no other. Buy your food truck, customize it with the equipment, go shopping, and start the day! The real chaos starts there 😈. Prepare your ingredients during the prep time early in the morning 🕝 and get ready for the rush hours 🧑‍🤝‍🧑 !

🎮 Early Access Exclusive: During our early access phase, Grill on Wheels will be completely free to play! This is your chance to be part of the adventure from the very beginning without any cost.

🌐 Join Our Community on Discord: https://bit.ly/GrillOnWheels

🤖 Join Our Subreddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/GrillOnWheels/

We believe that the Oculus community is the heart and soul of gaming, and we want you to be a part of it! Join us on Discord to connect with other foodies, share your excitement, track the development, and be among the first to apply to the closed beta.

Spread the word, invite your friends, and help us build an amazing community around Grill on Wheels. Let's make this VR culinary journey unforgettable together!

We can't wait to see you on the road. Stay tuned for more updates, sneak peeks, and delicious surprises. 🚚🍔🍟

♾️ Store Pages
STEAM:  https://garagevr.co/gow_steam
OCULUS:  https://garagevr.co/gow_oculus
RIFT:  https://garagevr.co/gow_rift
